item.title: About
item.description:
I am an independent software contractor living in the island of Malta.

My idols in the software industry are Martin Fowler, Dan North, and Fred George.

Among my interests are enterprise integration and mobile application development. You can follow my projects on GitHub.

I offer on-site as well as remote consultancy services on the following technologies:

  • Java EE
  • Mule
  • Ruby/JRuby
  • Ruby on Rails
  • ZeroMQ
  • Apache ActiveMQ
  • Apache CXF

I am available for:

  • Software Development
  • Architectural and code reviews
  • Technical support
  • Delivering technical training

You can get in touch with me by connecting on LinkedIn.
